casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Shaheed BATEMAN, Defendant-Movant. M-733 September Term 2017
080602 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 12, 2018

CORRECTED ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the Superior Court, Appellate Division for reconsideration in light of State v. S.N., 231 N.J. 497, 176 A.3d 813 (2018).
